content: Hey folks! Could somebody post an update to https://github.com/rust-lang/lang-team/issues/88 for the monthly lang team planning meeting next Wednesday? Thanks!
Posted :thumbs_up:

Hey all!

The lang team is holding the next planning meeting on July 7th (next week), and is looking for updates from the active projects. Please leave them on your issue on the lang-team repo: https://github.com/rust-lang/lang-team/issues/88

Good questions to consider:

  • What are recent topics of discussion?
  • Any exciting developments since the last check-in?
  • Any points where the group is stuck and the lang-team could weigh in?
  • Any potential design meeting topics?
  • Any other concerns?

No worries if there's not been any significant progress since the last update.

It looks like several of the questions raised in the last meeting weren't yet communicated back -- I believe I was on the hook to do that? -- I unfortunately haven't had the time yet, but you can look here for the meeting notes https://hackmd.io/vZzzEVIMRiWN_7eptYxaOg?view#deref-patterns

Maybe someone on the group can take on trying to create the asked for doc (not by the meeting next week, necessarily)?
Oh yeah, I meant to do this.
I'll do the update today, and get a doc together by Wednesday.
